name: The Notion Handbook
description: A Wide Collection of Notion Resources at Your Fingertips.Getting the hang of Notion can be confusing and overwhelming. When I first started, I had no idea what to do on top of having no idea what I could do inside Notion. "Wait, I can use chrome extensions?""Wait, I can upload custom icons??""Wait, I can embed cool widgets???"Obviously, there was a lot for me to figure out. And that's exactly why I made The Notion Handbook.This is the exact template I wish I had when I first started using Notion
features: Tools & widgets; Chrome extensions; Template inspiration; Website Builders; Communities; Marketplace
